title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 150.11 - Swimming, diving, fishing and hunting at canal structures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 150.11 - Swimming, diving, fishing and hunting at canal structures

State Regulations

Swimming, diving or fishing in the lock chambers or from
the lock walls or any other canal structure is prohibited. Hunting on, at or
near canal locks or any other canal structure is prohibited. Any person
violating this section shall be subject to a penalty of not to exceed $25 for
each offense. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21

150.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
